item.title: Live updates: House voting on bill to advance Trump’s legislative agenda
item.description: Get the latest news on President Donald Trump’s return to the White House and the new Congress.

item.title: Democratic senators call for insider trading investigation of White House
With many career lawyers gone, Justice Dept. hires Trump loyalists for court
item.description: The Justice Department is building a roster of lawyers willing to defend in court the most controversial parts of President Donald Trump’s agenda.
